371_baterdene.java

class Solution {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//System.out.println(Solution.count_inc(new int [] {1, 2, 1, 4, 5, 4}));
	}
	public int[] generate(int a[]) {
		int n = a.length;
		int answer[] = new int[1<<n];
		for (int mask = 0; mask < (1<<n); mask ++) {
			int s = 0;
			for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++ ) {
				if ( (mask & (1<<i)) != 0) {
					s = s + a[i];
				}
			}
			answer[mask] = s;
		}
		Arrays.sort(answer);
		return answer;
	}
	int find (int goal, int base, int a[]) {
		int n = a.length;
		int low = 0;
		int high = n - 1;
		while (low < high) {
			int mid = (low + high + 1) / 2;
			if (a[mid] + base > goal) {
				high = mid - 1;
			} else low = mid;
		}
		int f1 = high;
		low = 0;
		high = n - 1;
		
		while (low < high) {
			int mid = (low + high) / 2;
			if (a[mid] + base < goal) {
				low = mid + 1;
			} else high = mid;
		}
		return Math.min( Math.abs(goal - base - a[f1]) , Math.abs(goal - base - a[low]));
	}
	
	public int minAbsDifference(int[] nums, int goal) {
		int n = nums.length / 2;
		int m = nums.length - n;
		int a[] = new int[n];
		int b[] = new int[m];
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++ ) {
			a[i] = nums[i];
		}
		for (int i = 0; i < m; i ++ ) {
			b[i] = nums[n + i];
		}
		a = generate(a);
		b = generate(b);
		int answer = Math.abs(goal);
		for (int i = 0; i < b.length; i ++ ) {
			answer = Math.min(answer, find(goal , b[i], a));
		}
		return answer;
    }
}
